sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button } from '../ButtonElements'; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Img, ImgWrap } from './InfoElements'; const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary, dark, dark2 }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ); }; export default InfoSection;
